duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a comprehensive sales strategy for the assigned territory, outlining goals, objectives, and action plans to achieve and exceed sales targets.
Maintain and strengthen relationships with existing accounts, ensuring regular communication, addressing concerns, and identifying upselling opportunities.
Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the territory, including prospecting potential accounts, negotiating contracts, and closing deals.
Possess in-depth knowledge of the beer portfolio, including flavor profiles, brewing processes, and production methods, enabling confident education of clients and consumers.
Continuously monitor market trends, competitive landscape, and consumer preferences to identify opportunities for growth and adaptation.
Serve as the brand ambassador at events, trade shows, and industry functions, fostering a positive brand image and expanding brand visibility.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of sales activities, account interactions, and market insights, regularly reporting to the Sales Director.
Provide exceptional customer service by promptly addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and building strong relationships with key accounts.
Work closely with the marketing and distribution teams to align on promotional strategies, product launches, and inventory management.
Travel within the designated territory to meet clients and prospects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
